name: Bumparound
description:
HOW TO PLAY

  • ↑↓←→ to move
  • X to reset level (useful if stuck)
  • Each level starts blank. You must reveal the layout as you Bumparound!
  • Once a tile is revealed, avoid the red and collect the green. 
  • Collect enough green circles to advance to the next stage.
  • Collect a red X and you will lose a green circle. Lose all your green circles and the stage will reset.

Submission for LDJAM45 "Start With Nothing"
